node.html: Application for expired product management powered by deep learning with Inception ResNet V2. Recognizes expiration dates from product packaging and identifies spoilage levels for unpackaged products. Features barcode scanning for detailed product information retrieval.
Memories is a personal blog content creator application that I use to write articles and my personal experiences, has full features like the Blogger platform from Google.
Django boilerplate application to make work easier if you want to create applications with django, integrated with Internationalization and localization, Bootstrap v5.0, liveload server, and debug.
Data analysis project tracking Covid-19 trends and recovery patterns across multiple countries using Python data science tools.
Simple realtime chat app built with django and channels.
